The entities "PzNDTDTBT", "PzNDTDTBO", "zNDT", "BT", and "BO" are the only ones that can be considered as material properties in the given paragraph. The other terms, such as "donor unit" and "acceptor unit", are not material properties themselves but rather describe the role or function of certain material properties.
